extendedInfo.description: U.S. CellularÂ® Family Organizer powered by Cozi helps you manage your busy family with a centralized calendar, shopping lists, to do lists and a family journal that everyone can share on the go.â¢ Shared Family CalendarManage the family calendar right from your phone. Add an appointment and it uploads to your account so everyone can see it. Set reminders that are sent by text or email so no one misses soccer practice or an important event.â¢ Shopping ListsShared grocery lists the whole family can access from wherever they are. Retrieve them when you're at the storeâeasily cross off items and add new ones while you shop. No more coming home with everything but the one thing you needed.â¢ To Do ListsAdd a to do list item right when you think of it. Create a shared to do list the whole family can see. You can even email or text a list to a family member.â¢ Family JournalJot down a special moment and add a photo all while you're on the move. U.S. Cellular Family Organizer's journal is designed especially for busy families, so it's quick and easy to keep favorite memories you don't want to forget.â¢ WidgetsHome screen widgets give you quick access to your family calendar, shopping lists and to do lists. Choose from small and large widget sizes to customize your at-a-glance view.â¢ Plus- Your U.S. Cellular Family Organizer powered by Cozi is accessible from your mobile device as well as from any computer by visiting cozi.com/uscellular- No matter where or how you and your family access the account, you'll always be looking at the same information. - The whole family shares one account that everyone can access using their own email address (as specified in Settings) and the shared family password.- If you have questions about the U.S. Cellular Family Organizer app or require assistance, please contact us by visiting "http://www.uscellular.com/support/contact-us/index.html"

reviews.title: Pretty darn cool!
reviews.comment: Would be 5 stars if it allows personalized alarm tones and didn\'t have a \"canned\" message to notify family pre-appointment.  Also, any way this app could remind me about MISSED appointments?
reviews.author: Jamie Baldwin

reviews.title: Handy but hope developers are open to suggestions
reviews.comment: This keeps my family on task and up-to-date. We have 4 children ages 9-16 and they all have this loaded on their devices. A few suggestions would be: 1) Let us customize the computer month view so everything isn\'t so mashed together. 2) Please incorporate a way to customize the widgets on the mobile devices, would LOVE to be able to scroll on the widgets. 3) Need more widget sizes to choose from (like Calengoo). This has so much potential I hope you spend some time improving it.
reviews.author: Stacey A

reviews.title: Great and easy to use!!
reviews.comment: I love this app for my life and my family. If you don\'t like this app then you don\'t know how to use it. It\'s a must have app. I didn\'t want to ditch my paper pocket calendar, but this app made this an easy transition! Thank you.
reviews.author: Beth Lopes

reviews.comment: Wow..wish i could use it!  My husband was anle to get set up...but i cant put my email address in...it says it is already used ..wth...i have never signed up for this app..tried numerous times..gave up
reviews.author: Heather O\'Keefe

reviews.title: Excellent App!
reviews.comment: This gives my family a way to keep schedules up to date for each of us as well as making a shopping list handy for all to add to before one of us ho shopping. EXTREMELY EASY TO USE & NON-INVASIVE!!!!
reviews.author: Virginia Rosche

reviews.comment: I really enjoyed the app at first but now it keeps closing itself upon me opening it. Would be four stars if I could actually still use it. :(
reviews.author: Hope Lundy

reviews.comment: Great app.  Seems they fixed whatever was making it crash.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love this app! It keeps all my families appointments and notifies the correct person before hand!!
reviews.author: Tara Banks

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great app. With all that our family does this app has helped us keep everything in line and on schedule. It is very useful. The grocery list and calendar are the best things about it. I do wish it would sync with my phone calendar.
reviews.author: Marvin Greer

reviews.title: Love it!!!
reviews.comment: Great way to stay connected with the family, make sure everyone knows what plans are, keep everyone in the loop about groceries, keep a list, to share or privately, and even a journal,... It\'s awesome!
reviews.author: Rebecca David

reviews.title: Pretty darn awesome for a fee ap
reviews.comment: I would hate to live without this app,except if it was not free. It allows all family members to put items on the grocery list, and the calendar so everyone knows where everyone\'s going to be, it is so great.
reviews.author: Jalisa Jewels

reviews.title: Constant crash galaxy s3
reviews.comment: Was working okay (only occasional crash), now it crashes constantly. Its a simple app in concept and useful, if it was accessible. Fix the.crash and I\'ll raise the score.
reviews.author: Grey Wolfe

reviews.title: Love it if app didn\'t immediately crash
reviews.comment: I have used this app for months & my family LOVED it.  However it no longer works (last upgrade?).  Upon start, it now crashes & I am unable to use.  Reinstalled- same problem.  I cannot access my calendar, shopping lists, etc.  Considered upgrading, but cost is high & I am fearful I will have the same problem.  Time to find a new app.  Very disappointed!! I can no longer recommend as I had in the past.
reviews.author: Patricia Blasco

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: My family and i use it daily and helps us so Much with listing items needed and to  all be on the same page with appointments.  Couldn\'t live without it now! !
reviews.author: Nichole Pinkston

reviews.title: Very Pleased
reviews.comment: I can now have my to do lists, grocery lists and events calendar all in one place and share it with my husband. I love it.
reviews.author: Elise Washington

reviews.title: Forcing Close lately
reviews.comment: I have been using family organizer for about a year now, I\'ve been having issues of it forcing close every time I open it. I rely on this for everything I do,  especially during the summer. Please fix whatever issue you\'ve been having.
reviews.author: Trish D

reviews.title: Calendar
reviews.comment: Very pleased with the calendar, use it for all of my appointments. I use it every day
reviews.author: Brenda Mills

reviews.title: Great Tool
reviews.comment: Now I don\'t have to keep reminding family about appointments.  The shopping list works wonderfully a well. Love it!
reviews.author: Bette Baker

reviews.title: Was good, now horrible
reviews.comment: Was a great way to stay in sync with family\'s appts, but now it force-close and hasn\'t been fixed yet. Issue was reported already =(
reviews.author: Kevin Burkhardt

reviews.title: Cozi calendar
reviews.comment: Love it! All My lists and Calendar at a glance! Color coding is great for family members. I never forget my shopping list anymore.
reviews.author: A Google User
